alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, western Pine and south central Carlton Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brook Park, to near Cambridge, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine City, Hinckley, Sandstone, Rock Creek, Willow River, Askov, Rutledge, Kettle River, Brook Park, Bruno, Henriette, Sturgeon Lake, Finlayson, Denham, Banning State Park, West Rock, Friesland, Beroun, Grindstone Lake Pine County, and Moose Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin
